content:
Back in Dec 5 I wrote this.

It's time to cash out all your crypto and shift your portfolio to a much more conservative balance concentrating on bonds and dividend stocks.

in the immortal words of Warren Buffet.

When everybody is buying, sell. Price will go up after you sell but don't worry.
When everybody is selling, buy. Price will go down after you buy but don't worry.

Time to get that lambo.

I did cash out all my crypto at or near it's peak. Not lambo money or anything but enough to make me happy.

Unfortunately I was not able to trade my stock for bonds because I no longer live in the USA and I was too cowardly to sell and just sit on cash. So I guess I wasn't that much of a prophet.

Hope the stock market recovers before I start cashing out my 401K
That'd be an interesting Zulip bot project: allow folks to post predictions with ETAs, and the bot resurfaces the prediction at that later date :)

We could rate how accurate the prediction was
I like the other metric that Oxide & Friends has: how bold/risky a prediction is
As predictable predictions aren't as interesting
That would be a fun game. Maybe an app idea.
